artist: Artist: Charles Rennie Mackintosh; Artist: Margaret Macdonald Mackintosh; Publisher: Ver Sacrum, Vienna
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: Issue devoted to the work of Charles Rennie Mackintosh, Margaret Macdonald-Mackintosh, and Frances Mac Nair; contains two color plates by Mackintosh.
medium: Letterpress, photographic illustrations, color process prints; bound volume
provenance: Norwest Corporation, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1998.
title: Ver Sacrum IV (Sacred Spring), Heft 23
